name: Succubus Empire
startIntroPart1: After years of living in the shadows, the magical beings known as succubi have revealed their glorious lust to their human prey.
startIntroPart2: Empress Eiko, will you live in harmony with humanity or enslave them for your own sadistic pleasure?
declaringWar: We will no longer suffer your presence. Prepare for war!
attacked: So it has come to this. We shall burn you to the ground!
defeated: And so the Succubi are defeated... but do not think your victory shall last.
introduction: Greetings. I am Eiko, Empress of the Succubi.
tradeRequest: Would you be interested in this proposition?
uniqueText: +100% to all yields while happy. -90% City-state influence degradation.
